## Introduction
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
N=100
X = runif(N)
df = data.frame(x=X,y=10*X+runif(N,min=-2, max=2))
plot(df)

```


```{r}
reg=lm(data=df, y~x)
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(reg)
summary(reg)
par(mfrow=c(1,1))
```
